3.description: Aromatic and slightly sweet grilled eel with Japanese unagi sauce, adding exceptional depth of flavor.

4.name: With smoked salmon
4.description: A classic combination of delicately smoked salmon and lightly seasoned rice that melts in your mouth.

5.name: With shrimp
5.description: A juicy, slightly sweet shrimp placed on soft rice, creating a harmonious and subtle composition.

1.description: Delicate rice boats filled with fresh masago fish eggs, adding exceptional flavor and crunchiness.

2.name: With hiyashi
2.description: A cool, refreshing gunkan with raw vegetables and dressing, perfect for summer days, offering lightness and freshness in every bite.

1.description: A light and refreshing roll with crispy cucumber, perfectly complementing rice and nori.

2.name: With avocado
2.description: Creamy, ripe avocado combined with rice and nori creates a delicate, flavorful roll.

3.name: With surimi
3.description: A roll with surimi, an imitation of shrimp, offering a subtle seafood note combined with rice and vegetables.

4.name: With shrimp
4.description: A roll with juicy shrimp, adding lightness and freshness to the dish.

5.name: With tempura shrimp
5.description: Crispy tempura-battered shrimp, adding exceptional texture and flavor to the roll.

6.name: With salmon
6.description: Fresh salmon combined with rice and nori creates a harmonious and flavorful roll.

7.name: With smoked salmon
7.description: Smoked salmon with a deep flavor that pairs perfectly with rice, creating an intense roll.

8.name: With tuna

9.name: With eel
9.description: Grilled eel adds a slightly sweet taste to the roll, perfectly complementing rice and unagi sauce.

1.name: With salmon
1.description: A delicious roll with pieces of fresh salmon, avocado, and cucumber, wrapped in sesame seeds, creating a harmonious flavor composition.

2.name: With smoked salmon
2.description: A combination of smoked salmon, avocado, and cucumber in a delicate rice wrap, offering an intense, smoky flavor.

3.name: With lightly salted salmon
3.description: An exceptional roll with salted salmon, avocado, and cucumber, wrapped in sesame seeds, offering a subtle, savory taste.

4.name: Classic
4.description: The classic version of the roll with pieces of surimi, avocado, and cucumber, wrapped in sesame seeds, perfect for fans of traditional flavors.

1.name: Red
1.description: A roll with spicy tuna, avocado, and fresh cucumber, coated in a red glaze with chili sauce, adding spiciness and intensity.

2.name: Orange
2.description: A combination of delicate salmon, creamy avocado, and fresh cucumber, wrapped in an orange glaze, adding juiciness and a fruity aftertaste.

3.name: Golden
3.description: An elegant roll with smoked salmon, avocado, and sesame, wrapped in a golden glaze, highlighting its exquisite taste and aroma.

4.name: Green
4.description: A fresh roll with avocado, cucumber, and tuna, covered in a green glaze, giving it a refreshing taste and lightness.

5.name: Tiger

1.name: With tempura shrimp
1.description: Crunch with tempura shrimp is a crispy sushi roll with masago, crunchy toppings, cucumber, and mayonnaise, combining the delicacy of shrimp with the bold flavor of the ingredients.

2.name: With surimi
2.description: Crunch with surimi is a unique combination of masago, crunchy toppings, cucumber, shiitake mushrooms, and delicate mayonnaise, creating a harmonious blend of flavors and textures.

1.name: With salmon
1.description: Philadelphia with salmon is a classic sushi roll where delicate cream cheese blends with creamy avocado and juicy, fresh salmon. This combination creates a velvety and harmonious taste, perfect for lovers of mild yet sophisticated compositions.

2.name: With smoked salmon
2.description: Philadelphia with smoked salmon is a classic sushi roll consisting of creamy cheese, fresh cucumber, and delicate smoked salmon. Wrapped in perfectly cooked rice and nori, it offers a harmonious combination of flavors and a creamy texture.

3.name: Unagi
3.description: Philadelphia Unagi is a delicious sushi roll combining creamy cheese and crunchy sesame with the intense flavor of eel (unagi). The addition of masago provides a delicate texture, while fresh cucumber and avocado ensure the perfect balance of flavors.
3.count: (sesame, cream cheese, masago, eel, cucumber, avocado), 8 pcs.

4.name: With tuna
4.description: Philadelphia with tuna is a delicious sushi roll with creamy cheese, delicate tuna, and velvety avocado, wrapped in nori and rice. A perfect flavor combination for sushi lovers!

5.name: Ebi
5.description: Philadelphia Ebi is a classic sushi roll consisting of creamy cheese, fresh salmon, and velvety avocado. The delicate combination of flavors makes it one of the most popular sushi menu choices.

6.name: Cheddar
6.description: Philadelphia Cheddar is creamy cheese with an intense cheddar flavor and a slightly salty aroma of salmon. Perfect for sandwiches, snacks, and sauces, it combines a bold cheesy character with a hint of fish delicacy.

7.name: With tempura shrimp
7.description: Philadelphia with tempura shrimp is a delicious sushi roll with creamy cheese, fresh cucumber, and salmon, enriched with crispy tempura shrimp. Delicate yet full of flavor!
